node.title: Melbourne cafe owner afraid to go to work after death threat left at vandalised store
node.alt: A note on a window says "do what Daniel Andrews says and we will burn your shop down"
node.description: A Melbourne cafe owner is left with a hefty damage bill after vandals break a window at his cafe, leaving behind a threatening note singling out the state government's COVID regulations.
node.content:
["A Thornbury cafe owner says he is scared to work after vandals targeted his business, causing damage and\u00a0leaving a death threat.", "The inner-city venue in Melbourne's north\u00a0racked up thousands of dollars in damage after a brick was hurled through Briki Cafe on Monday.", "Owner Symeon Kandias said he saw glass strewn all over the pavement in front of his shop when he turned up to work in the morning.", "\"My main window where I serve the coffee from was \u2026 in a million pieces,\" he said.", "\"[I] had a closer look, there was a massive brown brick inside.\"", "Mr Kandias\u00a0said there was also a \"threatening note\" on the front door with a death threat.", "\"It was a bit confronting, to be honest.\"", "", "
Briki cafe owner Symeon Kandias said his customers had all been happy to show their vaccination status.(ABC News: Oliver Gordon)
", "According to the Victorian Government regulations, it is mandatory for non-essential businesses, including cafes, to ask patrons for\u00a0proof of vaccine.", "Mr Kandias said he was just following state regulations and couldn't understand who would do such a thing.", "\"I am trying to do everything here by the book. I am following all the regulations,\" he said.", "\"I am just trying to keep myself and the community safe.", "\"If we, the little guys,\u00a0don't follow these rules, we won't survive.\"", "Mr Kandias said he was sure the culprits were not from the area because\u00a0his customers were always happy to show their vaccine certificates.", "\"It is pretty extreme,\" he said.", "\"I have never experienced anything or [seen]\u00a0anything like this before here in Melbourne.\"", "", "
Mr\u00a0Kandias says the vandals have made him feel\u00a0vulnerable in his shop.(Supplied)
", "Transport Infrastructure Minister Jacinta Allan said\u00a0that sort of\u00a0behaviour was \"just not on\" when asked about the incident.", "Ms Allan said police had been working hard to respond to similar behaviour.", "\"We've seen far too many unacceptable examples of people threatening violence simply because people are making the choice to do the right thing,\" she said.", "", "
Briki Cafe owner\u00a0Symeon Kandias says he showed up to work and saw the glass all over the pavement.(Supplied)
", "But\u00a0Mr Kandias said the incident had left him feeling\u00a0vulnerable.", "\"I have never been threatened before in my life,\" he said.", "Victoria Police confirmed it was investigating the incident.", "", "
What COVID-19 travel insurance doesn't cover you for(Emilia Terzon)
"]
